docs.snippet: Rory McIlroy leaned over and rested his hand on the top of his driver. At the turn, waiting for the green to clear, he twirled half of a bagel in his finger and then ducked inside a tent to sit on a table. In his return to golf after seven weeks, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy leaned over and rested his hand on the top of his driver. At the turn, waiting for the green to clear, he twirled half of a bagel in his finger and then ducked inside a tent to sit on a table. In his return to golf after seven weeks, he didn't look to be in the best of shape Thursday at the Mexico Championship.

headline.main: Good Ribs, Bad Stomach, and McIlroy 1 Off Lead in Return
headline.print_headline: Good Ribs, Bad Stomach, and McIlroy 1 Off Lead in Return
